name: Mahjong Fight Club: Shinsei Zenkoku Taisen Han
name_original: Mahjong Fight Club: Shinsei Zenkoku Taisen Han
description:
Mahjong Fight Club: Shinsei Zenkoku Taisen Han is a digital board game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It came out on 17-12-2011. Konami published the game.
You can play Mahjong Fight Club: Shinsei Zenkoku Taisen Han on PS Vita.
